rawConfiguration.text:
![New Relic](https://newrelic.com/assets/newrelic/source/NewRelic-logo-bug.png)

#  infrastructure Overview Dashboard
This dashboard shows metrics and events from the infrastructure Service on the Full Stack Observability Platform (FSO) 
    
[Dive deeper into Infrastructure Health and Performance](https://one.newrelic.com/launcher/maps.health-map-launcher?pane=eyJuZXJkbGV0SWQiOiJtYXBzLmhlYWx0aC1tYXAiLCJjbHVzdGVyQnkiOiJIT1NUIn0&platform[accountId]=1606862)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(cpuPercent) FROM SystemSample since 3 hours ago facet hostname limit 400
SELECT average(receiveBytesPerSecond), average(transmitBytesPerSecond) FROM NetworkSample SINCE 30 MINUTES AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT uniqueCount(entityId) from ComputeSample WHERE provider = 'Ec2Instance' AND providerAccountId = '1895' facet `provider.awsRegion`
SELECT average(memoryUsedBytes) /1000000 AS 'Avg MB Used', average(memoryFreeBytes)/1000000 AS 'Avg MB Free' FROM SystemSample since 10 minutes ago
SELECT average(loadAverageOneMinute) , average(loadAverageFiveMinute), average(loadAverageFifteenMinute) FROM SystemSample since 3 hours ago TIMESERIES
SELECT max(diskUsedPercent) as 'Percent Full' FROM StorageSample since 1 minute ago
SELECT average(readBytesPerSecond), average(writeBytesPerSecond) FROM StorageSample SINCE 30 MINUTES AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT count(criticalViolationCount) from SystemSample facet hostname since 30 minutes ago

widgets.title: What is the IPv6 Address of the Host

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT uniquecount(hostname) FROM NetworkSample SINCE 30 MINUTES AGO facet ipV6Address, hostname

widgets.title: 5 minute Load Average grouped by Host

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(loadAverageFiveMinute) FROM SystemSample SINCE 30 MINUTES AGO facet hostname

widgets.title: What is the IPv4 Address of the Host

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT uniquecount(hostname) FROM NetworkSample SINCE 30 MINUTES AGO facet ipV4Address, hostname
SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction FACET host SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT count(*), average(threadCount), average(cpuPercent), average(cpuSystemPercent) FROM ProcessSample FACET commandName SINCE 1 hour ago
SELECT max(databaseDuration) as 'Max Duration' from Transaction where appName = 'Inventory Service' since 1 day ago compare with 1 day ago FACET host
SELECT average(transmitBytesPerSecond)/1024/1024 as 'MB/Sec transmitted' FROM NetworkSample SINCE 30 MINUTES AGO facet hostname
SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError FACET error_type SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES
SELECT average(networkDuration*10*-1) as 'AVG. Network Duration' FROM PageView SINCE 1 HOUR AGO COMPARE WITH 1 hour AGO TIMESERIES
SELECT max(duration) from Transaction since 1 day ago compare with 1 day ago

widgets.title: Worst Performing Network Time Per PageUrl - TimeSeries

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(networkDuration) from PageView facet name since 1 day ago limit 5 timeseries
SELECT average(networkDuration*10) as 'AVG. Network Duration' FROM PageView SINCE 1 HOUR AGO COMPARE WITH 1 hour AGO
SELECT count(receivePacketsPerSecond) as 'Packets Per Second' FROM NetworkSample SINCE 1 hour AGO compare with 1 hour ago
SELECT count(*) from Transaction  since 1 day ago facet host limit 5
SELECT average(transmitBytesPerSecond) from NetworkSample FACET hostname LIMIT 5 timeseries

widgets.title: Traffic Per Host - Load Balanced - TimeSeries

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) from Transaction  since 1 day ago facet host limit 5 TIMESERIES
select average(cpuPercent) from SystemSample facet hostname limit 5

widgets.title: Percentage of Hosts On-Premises (Query changes needed)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentage(count(*) / 100, WHERE appName = 'WebPortal' OR appName = 'Plan Service') as 'Percent of hosts On-premises' FROM Transaction WHERE appName NOT LIKE '%Tower%' since 10 minutes ago limit 100
select 100 * average(memoryUsedBytes) / (average(memoryFreeBytes) + average(memoryUsedBytes)) as PctUsed from SystemSample facet hostname limit 5
select average(diskUsedPercent) from StorageSample facet hostname limit 5 TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError FACET appName SINCE 1 hour ago
select average(cpuPercent) from SystemSample facet hostname limit 5 timeseries 5 minutes

widgets.title: Total number of hosts by Application (Query changes needed)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) / 100 as 'Hosts' FROM Transaction WHERE appName NOT LIKE '%Tower%' FACET appName   SINCE 1 day ago
select apdex(duration , t: 0.5) * 100 FROM Transaction facet appName limit 5
SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') as 'Uptime' from SyntheticCheck  limit 1000 since 1 week ago
SELECT count(*) FROM InfrastructureEvent,StorageSample,SystemSample FACET hostname SINCE 1 month ago LIMIT 25
SELECT average(cpuSystemPercent) FROM SystemSample since 3 hours ago facet hostname limit 400
SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError FACET host SINCE 1 hour ago
select apdex(duration , t: 0.5) * 100 FROM Transaction facet host limit 5
SELECT average(duration) from Transaction  since 3 hours ago
SELECT average(cpuPercent), average(memoryUsedBytes / memoryTotalBytes) * 100 AS 'Memory Used Percent' FROM SystemSample FACET hostname SINCE 5 minutes ago
SELECT average(cpuSystemPercent), average(cpuIOWaitPercent), average(cpuUserPercent), average(cpuStealPercent) from SystemSample SINCE 60 minutes ago    TIMESERIES
SELECT average(loadAverageOneMinute), average(loadAverageFiveMinute), average(loadAverageFifteenMinute) from SystemSample SINCE 60 minutes ago    TIMESERIES

SELECT average(memoryUsedBytes / memoryTotalBytes * 100) AS 'Memory Used Percent', average(memoryFreeBytes / memoryTotalBytes * 100) AS 'Memory Free Percent' FROM SystemSample SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
SELECT average(totalUtilizationPercent) FROM StorageSample TIMESERIES FACET `entityAndMountPoint` LIMIT 100 SINCE 60 minutes ago
SELECT average(receiveBytesPerSecond / 1024) AS 'Received', average(transmitBytesPerSecond / 1024) AS 'Transmitted' FROM NetworkSample SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES

SELECT uniqueCount(processId), latest(userName), average(cpuPercent) AS 'CPU Percent', average(memoryResidentSizeBytes) / 1024000 AS 'Memory (MB)' FROM ProcessSample FACET processDisplayName SINCE 1 hour ago

rawConfiguration.text:
![New Relic](https://newrelic.com/assets/newrelic/source/NewRelic-logo-bug.png)

#  Kubernetes Integration - Infrastructure Dashboard
This dashboard shows metrics and Uptime from the K8's Explorer on the Full Stack Observability Platform (FSO) 
    
[Dive deeper into Your K8's ](https://one.newrelic.com/launcher/k8s-cluster-explorer-nerdlet.cluster-explorer-launcher?pane=eyJuZXJkbGV0SWQiOiJrOHMtY2x1c3Rlci1leHBsb3Jlci1uZXJkbGV0Lms4cy1jbHVzdGVyLWxpc3QifQ==&platform[accountId]=1606862&platform[$isFallbackTimeRange]=false)

nrqlQueries.query: FROM K8sNodeSample, K8sPodSample select uniqueCount(podName) as 'Pods'

FROM K8sNodeSample, K8sNamespaceSample, K8sDeploymentSample, K8sPodSample, K8sContainerSample SELECT uniqueCount(K8sNodeSample.entityId) as 'Nodes', uniqueCount(K8sNamespaceSample.clusterName) as 'Clusters', uniqueCount(K8sNamespaceSample.entityId) as 'Namespaces', uniqueCount(K8sDeploymentSample.entityId) as 'Deployments', uniqueCount(K8sPodSample.entityId) as 'Pods', uniqueCount(K8sContainerSample.containerID) as 'Containers'
FROM K8sNamespaceSample SELECT uniqueCount(namespace) FACET clusterName limit 100
FROM K8sNodeSample SELECT (average(memoryUsedBytes) * uniqueCount(entityName)) / 1000000000 as 'GBytes'
FROM K8sContainerSample SELECT max(restartCount)-min(restartCount) as 'Restarts' FACET clusterName, podName, containerName TIMESERIES limit 50
FROM K8sPodSample SELECT uniqueCount(entityId) as 'pod' FACET namespace limit 100
FROM K8sNodeSample SELECT (average(cpuUsedCores) * uniqueCount(entityName)) as 'Cores'
SELECT latest(podsDesired) - latest(podsReady) as 'Missing Pods' FROM K8sReplicasetSample since 10 minutes ago facet deploymentName timeseries limit 50

widgets.title: Container CPU Usage - % Used vs Limit

nrqlQueries.query: FROM K8sContainerSample SELECT latest(cpuUsedCores/cpuLimitCores) * 100 as '% CPU' FACET clusterName, podName, containerName TIMESERIES limit 50

widgets.title: Container Memory Usage - % Used vs Limit

nrqlQueries.query: FROM K8sContainerSample SELECT latest(memoryUsedBytes/memoryLimitBytes) * 100 as '% Memory' FACET clusterName, podName, containerName TIMESERIES limit 50
SELECT uniqueCount(containerID) FROM K8sContainerSample SINCE 10 minutes AGO facet namespace TIMESERIES
SELECT average(cpuUsedCores) as 'CPU Cores Used' from K8sContainerSample FACET clusterName, podName, containerName timeseries since 60 minutes ago limit 50
SELECT average(memoryUsedBytes / 1000000) as 'MB of Mem' from K8sContainerSample FACET clusterName, podName, containerName timeseries since 60 minutes ago limit 50
SELECT uniqueCount(podName) FROM K8sPodSample where status='Running' SINCE 10 minutes AGO facet deploymentName TIMESERIES limit 50
SELECT latest(status) as 'Status' from K8sPodSample WHERE status NOT IN ('Running') facet clusterName, namespace, podName    since 10 minutes ago limit 100
SELECT uniquecount(podName) from K8sPodSample where status='Running' facet nodeName since 10 minutes ago
FROM K8sNodeSample, K8sPodSample SELECT average(cpuUsedCores) as 'Used Cores', average(memoryUsedBytes) as 'Used Memory', uniqueCount(podName) as 'Pods' FACET nodeName since 10 minutes ago limit 100

SELECT average(`net.rxBytesPerSecond`)/1000000 as 'Received MBps', average(`net.txBytesPerSecond`)/1000000 as 'Transmitted MBps', latest(`net.errorCount`) as 'Error Count' FROM K8sPodSample FACET podName since 10 minutes ago limit 100
SELECT average(cpuPercent), ((average(memoryUsedBytes)/1024)/1024)/1024 as 'Avg Memory Used in GB' FROM SystemSample FACET hostname SINCE 5 minutes ago limit 50
SELECT average(cpuPercent) as '% CPU Usage' FROM SystemSample SINCE 30 minutes ago
SELECT average(diskUsedPercent) as '% Disk Used' FROM StorageSample SINCE 30 minutes ago
SELECT average(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes)*100 as '% Memory Used' FROM SystemSample SINCE 30 minutes ago

SELECT average(cpuPercent) as '% CPU Usage', average(loadAverageOneMinute) as '1 min Load', average(loadAverageFiveMinute) as '5 min Load', average(loadAverageFifteenMinute) as '15 min Load', average(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes)*100 as '% Memory Used', average(memoryFreeBytes/memoryTotalBytes)*100 as '% Memory Free' FROM SystemSample SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT processDisplayName, cpuPercent, threadCount, userName, `nr.apmApplicationNames` as 'App Name' FROM ProcessSample since 5 minutes ago until 1 minute ago limit 100

SELECT average(diskUsedPercent) as '% Disk Used', average(diskFreePercent) as '% Free Disk', max(diskUsedPercent) as '% Max Disk Used', uniqueCount(mountPoint) as 'Mount Points' FROM StorageSample SINCE 1 day ago

SELECT average(receivePacketsPerSecond), average(transmitPacketsPerSecond), average(receiveDroppedPerSecond), average(transmitDroppedPerSecond), average(receiveErrorsPerSecond), average(transmitErrorsPerSecond) FROM NetworkSample since 1 day ago
SELECT average(diskUsedPercent) as '% Disk Used', average(diskFreePercent) as '% Disk Free' FROM StorageSample SINCE 30 minutes ago FACET device
SELECT ec2AmiId, ec2InstanceType, awsRegion,displayName FROM SystemSample since 5 minutes ago

SELECT max(cpuPercent), max(ioReadBytesPerSecond), max(ioReadCountPerSecond), max(ioWriteBytesPerSecond), max(ioWriteCountPerSecond), max(threadCount), max(fileDescriptorCount) FROM ProcessSample FACET commandName since 2 minutes ago limit 15
SELECT 50 as 'Threshold', average(cpuPercent) as '% CPU Usage' FROM SystemSample SINCE 1 month ago TIMESERIES
SELECT 50 as 'Threshold', average(diskUsedPercent) as '% Disk Used' FROM StorageSample SINCE 1 month ago TIMESERIES
SELECT 50 as 'Threshold', average(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes)*100 as '% Memory Used' FROM SystemSample SINCE 1 month ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Daily CPU Usage % by Instance Type

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(cpuPercent) FROM SystemSample FACET ec2InstanceType SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 10 minutes UNTIL 15 minutes ago

widgets.title: Weekly CPU Usage % by Instance Type

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(cpuPercent) FROM SystemSample FACET ec2InstanceType SINCE 7 day ago TIMESERIES 60 minutes

widgets.title: Monthly CPU Usage % by Instance Type

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(cpuPercent) FROM SystemSample FACET ec2InstanceType SINCE 30 day ago TIMESERIES 6 hours
SELECT average(cpuPercent) FROM SystemSample FACET awsRegion SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 10 minutes UNTIL 15 minutes ago
SELECT average(cpuPercent) FROM SystemSample FACET awsRegion SINCE 7 day ago TIMESERIES 60 minutes
SELECT average(cpuPercent) FROM SystemSample FACET awsRegion SINCE 30 day ago TIMESERIES 6 hours
SELECT average(cpuPercent), uniquecount(entityName) as 'Host Count' FROM SystemSample FACET instanceType SINCE 1 day ago limit 25 where cpuPercent < 20
SELECT average(cpuPercent), uniquecount(entityName) as 'Host Count' FROM SystemSample FACET instanceType SINCE 1 week ago limit 25 where cpuPercent < 20
SELECT average(cpuPercent), uniquecount(entityName) as 'Host Count' FROM SystemSample FACET instanceType SINCE 1 month ago limit 25 where cpuPercent < 20

FROM SystemSample SELECT filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 'i3.large')*117 AS 'i3.large',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 'c5.large')*63.75000000000001 AS 'c5.large',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 't2.micro')*8.7 AS 't2.micro',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 'r4.large')*99.75 AS 'r4.large',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 'c4.large')*75 AS 'c4.large',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 'c5.9xlarge')*1147.5 AS 'c5.9xlarge',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 'm4.2xlarge')*300 AS 'm4.2xlarge',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 't2.small')*17.25 AS 't2.small',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 't2.large')*69.6 AS 't2.large',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 'm4.large')*75 AS 'm4.large',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 'm5.large')*72 AS 'm5.large',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 'c5.2xlarge')*255.00000000000003 AS 'c5.2xlarge',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 't2.medium')*34.8 AS 't2.medium' SINCE 1 month ago

FROM SystemSample SELECT filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 'i3.large')*117*(filter(25-average(cpuPercent), WHERE instanceType = 'i3.large')/100) AS 'i3.large',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 'c5.large')*63.75000000000001*(filter(25-average(cpuPercent), WHERE instanceType = 'c5.large')/100) AS 'c5.large',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 't2.micro')*8.7*(filter(25-average(cpuPercent), WHERE instanceType = 't2.micro')/100) AS 't2.micro',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 'r4.large')*99.75*(filter(25-average(cpuPercent), WHERE instanceType = 'r4.large')/100) AS 'r4.large',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 'c4.large')*75*(filter(25-average(cpuPercent), WHERE instanceType = 'c4.large')/100) AS 'c4.large',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 'c5.9xlarge')*1147.5*(filter(25-average(cpuPercent), WHERE instanceType = 'c5.9xlarge')/100) AS 'c5.9xlarge',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 'm4.2xlarge')*300*(filter(25-average(cpuPercent), WHERE instanceType = 'm4.2xlarge')/100) AS 'm4.2xlarge',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 't2.small')*17.25*(filter(25-average(cpuPercent), WHERE instanceType = 't2.small')/100) AS 't2.small',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 't2.large')*69.6*(filter(25-average(cpuPercent), WHERE instanceType = 't2.large')/100) AS 't2.large',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 'm4.large')*75*(filter(25-average(cpuPercent), WHERE instanceType = 'm4.large')/100) AS 'm4.large',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 'm5.large')*72*(filter(25-average(cpuPercent), WHERE instanceType = 'm5.large')/100) AS 'm5.large',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 'c5.2xlarge')*255.00000000000003*(filter(25-average(cpuPercent), WHERE instanceType = 'c5.2xlarge')/100) AS 'c5.2xlarge',filter(uniquecount(entityName), where instanceType = 't2.medium')*34.8*(filter(25-average(cpuPercent), WHERE instanceType = 't2.medium')/100) AS 't2.medium' SINCE 1 month ago
SELECT average(cpuPercent), uniquecount(entityName) as 'Host Count' FROM SystemSample FACET apmApplicationNames SINCE 1 day ago limit 25 where cpuPercent < 20
SELECT average(cpuPercent), uniquecount(entityName) as 'Host Count' FROM SystemSample FACET `nr.apmApplicationNames` SINCE 1 week ago limit 25 where cpuPercent < 20
SELECT average(cpuPercent), uniquecount(entityName) as 'Host Count' FROM SystemSample FACET `nr.apmApplicationNames` SINCE 1 month ago limit 25 where cpuPercent < 20
SELECT average(cpuPercent) FROM SystemSample SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
SELECT average(cpuPercent) FROM SystemSample SINCE 1 week ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT average(cpuPercent) FROM SystemSample SINCE 1 month ago COMPARE WITH 1 month ago

widgets.title: Count of HOSTS Without Standardized APP Tag

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT uniqueCount(hostname)  FROM SystemSample where  `ec2Tag_Environment` LIKE 'Prod%' AND ec2Tag_App NOT IN ('assethistory', 'assetmetadata', 'capabilities', 'Reports', 'Gateway', 'Harvester', 'ProjectService', 'SharedAssetView', 'TagFileProcessor', 'unifiedfleet', 'utilization', 'V3DProductivity', 'VAdministrator', 'VAssetHistory', 'VAssetMetadata', 'VCapabilities', 'VFleet', 'VFoundation', 'VLandfill', 'VProductivity', 'VService', 'VSupportTool', 'UnifiedAPI', 'VUtilization', 'HarvesterDataMapper', 'VFuelLoss', 'FuelLoss','MasterDataAsset', 'MasterDataDevice')
